edu.fgcu.secrel

Class Authorizations

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.fgcu.secrel.Authorizations

  • public class Authorizations
extends Object
    This class contains methods for (un)authorizing roles to invoke services in the ScRelSystem and testing role-service authorization.
    Author:
    lngibson
